sentences.sContent: "Shall I put him in a box for you?"the saleslady asked.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Shall I put him in a box for you?"the saleslady asked.
sentences.sCn: “我帮你把他放到盒子里，好吗？” 女售货员问道。

sentences.sContent: She found a job as a saleslady at the Ludwig-Baumann furniture store in the Bronx and was able to hold it through the Depression.
sentences.sContent_eng: She found a job as a saleslady at the Ludwig-Baumann furniture store in the Bronx and was able to hold it through the Depression.
sentences.sCn: 她在布朗克斯区的路德维格-鲍曼家具店找了份售货员的工作，并且靠这份工作度过了整个大萧条时期。

words.tran: 销售的，售货的；有关销售的
[贸易] 女售货员；[贸易] 女店员
